snippet: Citigroup’s troubles in Mexico illustrate the challenges of emerging markets. | No mention of its founder in Men’s Wearhouse’s deal announcement. | SAC Capital Advisors gets a new name. | Herbalife shares fell after William A. Ackman accused...
abstract: Citigroup’s troubles in Mexico illustrate the challenges of emerging markets. | No mention of its founder in Men’s Wearhouse’s deal announcement. | SAC Capital Advisors gets a new name. | Herbalife shares fell after William A. Ackman accused the company of “operating illegally” in China.

headline.main: A Look at Citi's Challenges in Mexico
